items.title: Manhunt after jailed Epping hotel asylum seeker mistakenly released
items.description: Ethiopian national Hadush Kebatu sparked nationwide protests after sexually assaulting a 14-year-old girl.

items.title: US sends world's largest warship towards Caribbean as it ramps up military presence
items.description: The deployment of the USS Gerald R Ford marks a major escalation in what the US says is a campaign to target drug traffickers.

items.title: England's Kildunne wins on club return in 14-try PWR opener
items.description: England World cup stars Ellie Kildunne and Lucy Packer make a winning return to club rugby as Harlequins beat Loughborough Lightning in a stunning, 14...

items.title: Watch: Video appears to show asylum seeker after accidental release from prison
items.description: A video shared online appears to show Hadush Gerberslasie Kebatu walking along Chelmsford high street.

items.title: Leclerc fastest as rookies dominate first practice in Mexico
items.description: Charles Leclerc goes quickest in the first practice session at the Mexico City Grand Prix.
